meanings.definition: Protoceratopses: plural form of protoceratops, a genus of herbivorous dinosaur
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed many protoceratopses skeletons.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study protoceratopses to learn about ancient herbivorous dinosaurs.
meanings.sent3: The children were excited to see the protoceratopses fossils at the museum.
meanings.sent4: In the prehistoric world, protoceratopses roamed the land peacefully.
meanings.sent5: The protoceratopses in the exhibit looked so lifelike.

meanings.definition: Protoceratopses: belonging to or characteristic of the genus Protoceratops
meanings.sent1: The paleontologist identified the protoceratopses bones.
meanings.sent2: The protoceratopses features were distinct from other dinosaur species.
meanings.sent3: The protoceratopses pattern on the fossil was quite unique.
meanings.sent4: Her room was decorated with protoceratopses-themed items.
meanings.sent5: The protoceratopses exhibit showcased various artifacts.
